E&C Republicans Announce Next Phase of Their Effort to Hold Big Tech Accountable
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers issued the following statement on a comprehensive package of discussion draft bills to hold Big Tech accountable by improving transparency and content moderation accountability, reforming Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act, promoting competition, and preventing illegal and harmful activity on their platforms.

title: Rodgers, Jordan Release New Legislation to Rein in Big Tech Abuses of Section 230
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers and House Judiciary Committee Ranking Member Jim Jordan (R-OH)  released the following statement regarding their draft discussion bill to rein in Big Tech abuses of Section 230 protections.

title: Leader Rodgers Opening Remarks at Subcommittee Hearing With Federal Trade Commission
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks in today’s Consumer Protection and Commerce Subcommittee hearing with the Federal Trade Commission (FTC).

title: Leader Bilirakis Opening Remarks at Hearing With Federal Trade Commission
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Republican Leader for Consumer Protection and Commerce Gus Bilirakis (R-FL) delivered opening remarks at today’s subcommittee hearing with the members of the Federal Trade Commission (FTC).

title: Leader Rodgers Statement on CDC Mask Guidance
description: Washington, D.C.—House Energy and Commerce Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement regarding the Centers of Disease Control and Prevention’s (CDC) plans to update mask guidance for vaccinated people to wear masks indoors:

title: Leader Upton Remarks at Hearing With Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy Subcommittee Republican Leader Fred Upton (R-MI) delivered opening remarks at today’s Energy Subcommittee hearing with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC).

title: Leader Rodgers Remarks at Hearing With Federal Energy Regulatory Commission
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks in today’s Energy Subcommittee hearing with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC).
